message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $150 to me. Considering its quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $200 for it. I believe this is a fair offer given its value and what it can bring to you. Please let me know if this works for you or if you have any suggestions for a counteroffer.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  I'm really interested in your product, so I'm willing to pay $150 for it.  Let me know what you think.
